channel.title: Have you ever been beaten up?
channel.description:
Last Weekend, i shall not tell a cool tuff guy story!, oke last weekend i was in a bar incredeably drunk and for some reason a guy started to push me :s
so i pushed him back and i was so slow and drunk that i didnt saw him hitting me, he gave me a few pucnhes XD, and when he did, i was like wtf and i was like stunned for some reason.
then a guy came between us, but i started to get kinda angry now and drunk so i hitted that guy on his head who came between us XD ( a mistake), wich gave me a club ban, i may never set any step in that night club again.
and now i'm sitting here with a hurting jaw :s
so my question is have you ever been beaten up???

item.title: Have you ever been beaten up?

I’ve never been beaten up, I don’t start things with anyone. I usually mind my own business.

item.title: Have you ever been beaten up?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:49, topic:429666”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=532348.msg3894705#msg3894705 date=1327201044]

I’m 4’10" and i’m 14. No one ever messes with me! Naww. but the worst i ever got to a fight was like in 4th grade. I was playing kickball and the other kid was running around the bases and pushed me down. I got up and chased him and knocked him on the ground. my friend and i just started kicking him until he ran away off school grounds. He actually never came to school for the rest of the year. Oh and this year the worst i get to a fight is just me talking crap to someone else if they say something. Basically, everyone knows me as a short kid so usually only ghettos try to mess.

Probably because they feel sorry for you. 4th Grade, correct me if I’m wrong isn’t that when your level 9? I have a different grading system here and if I’m right, nobody considers that type of age group as a fight lol.
[/quote]4th grade is around 9–10year old o.o[/quote]I meant 9 years old oops.

I play too much Rs lul.

Read full topic

^ sorry for rant lol. on topic; the last fight i can remember being in was 4th grade with some huge blonde kid. he beat my ass. lover not a fighter lol :P[/quote]

also since english isnt my mother Language, i speak 4 Languages.

item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

I have been jumped, but never fully beaten up. I have an awful temper that gets to me when I’m in danger and I just don’t feel the pain. I still remember the day I got jumped, I actually broke my own hand punching a guy into a wall, but still kept doing it because I was so full of rage I didn’t even know.

item.source: Have you ever been beaten up?

item.title: Have you ever been beaten up?
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Lawl, Yeah…
I’ve been ‘beaten up’ once.
I was down in Everett at the Bus Station, maybe about 9-11PM some black guy came up to me (im now 17, was 15-16 at the time), but he asked me for my shoes!

So I said haha, fuck no you aint gettin my shoes LOL, next thing i know…
I’m walkin down the street north up the hill to catch a different bus (hits there faster), i’m about 1/3 up the hill when…
BAM, POW, KICK.
These black thugs come up from behind me (one of em), just starts wompin on me for like 4 seconds.
Next thing I know, i’m on the ground, i see my shoes…
Like 10ft that way ----> (guy really knocked me out my jordans) (GROWN ass man).
I get up and turn around and BOOM, I got some ghetto ass drunk white girl runnin @ me just swingin, pow, pow, pow!
I got up they took my shoes, I get on the bus, (I can hear them in the back talkin shit)
LOL @ ME, I went up and sat in the front of the bus.
But yeah, I could hear em back their lookin @ me, pointin, “Ah, I got that nigga good huh”, “YUP, right in dah chin”.
I just sat there holdin my jaw sheddin silent tears.

But…
I got off way before my stop (take a breather), at a gas station, this kind little church guy’s waiting at the bus stop, sees me, I tell him what happened, he gives me like 40$, tells me his wife’s on the way, and she’ll give me a ride to where i’m going, than as im getting out of the car they give me a new pair of shoes =D.

AND CHECK THIS SHIT OUT.
They dropped me off at wendy’s in Everett on 128th, ‘Airport road’ so I can meet my Sister Yolanda, so i get in her truck, we’re sittin there infront of wendy’s she goes inside.
I’m out in the car talking to my other sister ‘Zarminah’, than out of no where…
A COP…
Comes knocking on the window.
MY SISTER…
Set me up!.
(I had a warrent)
(Said it was for my own good, but yeah wtf!?!?)

Anyways…
There’s my beatdown story from back when I was a little hoodlum.

Read full topic
item.source: Have you ever been beaten up?
